QuestionJSON.Question: Comet is preparing to participate in a powerlifting competition. Comet has two different plans to follow. Plan A includes strength training with high weight and low repetitions, while Plan B includes endurance training with low weight and high repetitions. Which plan should Comet follow to prepare for the competition?
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Follow both Plan A and Plan B simultaneously
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Neither Plan A nor Plan B
QuestionJSON.Explanation: For a powerlifting competition, one needs to lift the maximum amount of weight in one repetition. So Comet would benefit more from Plan A which includes high weight and low repetitions.
